languages.text: Техножрецы доложили о неполадке в генераторе поля Геллера, в результате которой корабль остался на долю секунды без защиты от варпа. Согласно докладам блюстителей, что-то успело проникнуть на борт судна и теперь бродит по темным коридорам Пятого Погрузочного отсека...

The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...
languages.original_text: Техножрецы доложили о неполадке в генераторе поля Геллера, в результате которой корабль остался на долю секунды без защиты от варпа. Согласно докладам блюстителей, что-то успело проникнуть на борт судна и теперь бродит по темным коридорам Пятого Погрузочного отсека...

traits.locale_text: The tech-priest reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the security reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay Five...

The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay Five...

languages.text: 技术神甫报告说，盖勒立场发生了短暂的故障，导致飞船在亚空间中暴露了一秒钟。根据执法者的报告，确实有什么东西趁这个机会钻进了飞船，此刻正在五号装载区域的阴暗走廊里徘徊……
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...

traits.locale_text: 技术祭司报告说，盖勒立场发生了短暂的故障，导致飞船在亚空间中暴露了一秒钟。根据镇压者的报告，确实有什么东西趁这个机会钻进了飞船，此刻正在五号装载区域的阴暗走廊里徘徊……
技术神甫报告说，盖勒立场发生了短暂的故障，导致飞船在亚空间中暴露了一秒钟。根据执法者的报告，确实有什么东西趁这个机会钻进了飞船，此刻正在五号装载区域的阴暗走廊里徘徊……

languages.text: Los tecnosacerdotes informaron de una breve avería en el generador del Campo Geller que dejó a la nave expuesta a la disformidad durante un breve segundo. Según los informes de los ejecutores, algo consiguió entrar en la nave y ahora merodea por los oscuros pasillos del Muelle de Carga 5...
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...

traits.locale_text: Los tecnosacerdotes informaron de una breve avería en el generador del Campo Geller que dejó a la nave expuesta a la disformidad durante un breve segundo. Según los informes de los ejecutores, algo consiguió entrar en la nave y ahora merodea por los oscuros pasillos del Muelle de Carga Cinco...

languages.text: 技術司祭の報告では、ゲラーフィールド発生装置に一瞬だけ誤動作があって、ほんの少し船が<歪み>に晒されたという。執行官の報告では、何かがその隙に乗じて船に乗り込み、今でもローディングベイ5の暗い通路をウロチョロしているらしい…
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...

traits.locale_text: 技術司祭の報告では、ゲラーフィールド発生装置に一瞬だけ誤動作があって、ほんの少し船が<歪み>に晒されたという。執行官の報告では、何かがその隙に乗じて船に乗り込み、今でもローディングベイ5の暗い通路をウロチョロしているらしい…
技術司祭の報告では、ゲラーフィールド発生装置に一瞬だけ誤動作があって、ほんの少し船が<歪み>に晒されたという。執行官の報告では、何かがその隙に乗じて船に乗り込み、今でもローディングベイ5の暗い通路をウロチョロしているらしい…

languages.text: Les technoprêtres signalent un dysfonctionnement du générateur de champ de Geller qui a très brièvement exposé le vaisseau au Warp. D'après les rapports des prévôts, quelque chose a réussi à pénétrer dans le vaisseau et rôde désormais dans les couloirs sombres de la baie de chargement numéro 5...
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...

traits.locale_text: Les technoprêtres signalent un dysfonctionnement du générateur de champ de Geller qui a très brièvement exposé le vaisseau au Warp. D'après les rapports des prévôts, quelque chose a réussi à pénétrer dans le vaisseau et rôde désormais dans les couloirs sombres de la baie de chargement numéro 5...

languages.text: Die Techpriester haben eine kurze Fehlfunktion im Gellerfeldgenerator gemeldet, durch den das Schiff eine Sekunde lang dem Warp ausgesetzt war. Den Berichten der Enforcer zufolge ist etwas ins Schiff gelangt und kriecht nun durch die dunklen Gänge von Ladebucht 5 ...
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...

traits.locale_text: Die Techpriester haben eine kurze Fehlfunktion im Gellerfeldgenerator gemeldet, durch den das Schiff eine Sekunde lang dem Warp ausgesetzt war. Den Berichten der Enforcer zufolge ist etwas ins Schiff gelangt und kriecht nun durch die dunklen Gänge von Ladebucht 5 ...

languages.text: Tekno Rahipler, Geller alanı jeneratöründe kısa süreli bir arıza olduğunu bildirdi. Bu arıza, gemiyi kısa bir an için öteboyut etkilerine açık hâle getirdi. Güvenlik raporlarına göre gemiye bir varlık girdi ve şimdi 5. Yükleme Bölmesi'nin karanlık koridorlarında dolaşıyor...
languages.original_text: The Tech-Priests reported a brief malfunction in the Geller field generator that left the vessel exposed to the warp for a brief second. According to the enforcer reports, something did manage to get into the ship and is now prowling the dark corridors of Loading Bay 5...
